## loadMermaid() function

Load Mermaid and return a promise to the global mermaid object. Can also use `mermaid` after this promise resolves to get the same reference.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function loadMermaid(): Promise<any>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;
